title: Unauthorized Patient Record Access
description: Employee accesses patient records without business need (e.g., celebrity snooping)

title: Patient Data Exfiltration
description: Malicious insider downloads and sells patient data to third parties

title: Prescription Fraud
description: Healthcare worker manipulates prescription records for personal gain or illegal activity

title: Insider-Enabled Ransomware
description: Insider disables security controls to enable ransomware attack

title: Unauthorized System Access
description: Employee accesses systems beyond their authorized scope

title: PHI Transmission via Unsecured Email
description: Employee sends protected health information via personal email account

title: Intellectual Property Theft
description: Employee steals proprietary data before leaving for competitor

title: Financial Fraud
description: Insider manipulates financial records or initiates fraudulent transactions
